acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should fill POJOs with public, non default constructors
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldFillPojosWithPublicNonDefaultPublicConstructors

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.pdm33.NoDefaultPublicConstructorPojo
Then the Object NoDefaultPublicConstructorPojo ( firstName = kljzLVggF4 intField = -768183090 ) should not be null
Then the String field kljzLVggF4 cannot be null or empty
Then the int field should not be zero
